meta.description: Compress and archive your files directly in your browser with support for ZIP, TAR, and TAR.GZ formats. No server uploads, no installation required, and complete privacy protection. All compression processing happens locally on your device, ensuring your sensitive files never leave your computer.

compress.heading: Compress files on browser
compress.description:
Compress files in your browser without installing any programs.
All compression processes are performed in the browser, and no files are sent to the server.
Supported file formats: ZIP, TAR, TAR.GZ

fileDrop.title: Drag and drop your files here
fileDrop.description: Or click to select files from your computer

decompress.heading: Decompress files on browser
decompress.description:
Decompress files in your browser without installing any programs.
All decompression processes are performed in the browser, and no files are sent to the server.
Supported file formats: ZIP, TAR, TAR.GZ

preview.title: File preview
preview.description: The contents of the selected compressed file will be extracted.

fileDrop.title: Drag and drop your compressed file here
fileDrop.description: Or click to select a compressed file from your computer
